attributes.action: FREE PUBLIC TRANSPORT TO EMERGENCY NHS AMBULANCE STAFF
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Police get it so why Don't we? Its about time we got some thing back. With Terror a big Threat to our country and bombs going off it would be of great benefit to the public to have trained ambulance staff possibly very near by.

rejection.details: Please make your title a clear call for action, and do not write in capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
